videos.headline: Ford-Wheaton wins jump ball for the West Virginia touchdown
videos.description: JT Daniels goes up top to Bryce Ford-Wheaton, who outmuscles the defender for the West Virginia touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Ford-Wheaton wins jump ball for the West Virginia touchdown) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Pitt's Means makes sweet move but fumbles, giving ball back to WV
videos.description: Pittsburgh wide receiver Bub Means makes the sweet move to allude the defense, but loses the ball, and it's recovered by West Virginia.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Pitt's Means makes sweet move but fumbles, giving ball back to WV) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Pitt gets the ball right back after Hallett recovers the fumble
videos.description: West Virginia's Kaden Prather loses the football on the screen pass and it's recovered by Pittsburgh's Erick Hallett.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Pitt gets the ball right back after Hallett recovers the fumble) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Hammond gets help from his offensive line on impressive TD
videos.description: Rodney Hammond Jr. gets a push from his offensive line for a 4-yard Pittsburgh touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Hammond gets help from his offensive line on impressive TD) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Ford-Wheaton makes remarkable catch after Daniels' arm is hit
videos.description: JT Daniels has his arm hit on a throw and the ball flutters in the air only to be hauled in by Bryce Ford-Wheaton.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Ford-Wheaton makes remarkable catch after Daniels' arm is hit) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: CJ Donaldson does it all with a blocked punt and a rushing TD
videos.description: West Virginia's CJ Donaldson does it all with a blocked punt, then scores a rushing touchdown on the next play.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (CJ Donaldson does it all with a blocked punt and a rushing TD) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Wayne's 64-yard catch sets up the short Pitt TD
videos.description: Jared Wayne takes off and goes 64 yards to the one-yard line, setting up the short touchdown run.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Wayne's 64-yard catch sets up the short Pitt TD) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Hammond drags his offensive lineman and tacklers for a TD
videos.description: Rodney Hammond Jr. scores the 11-yard touchdown while dragging his own offensive lineman and a West Virginia tackler.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Hammond drags his offensive lineman and tacklers for a TD) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Daniels drops back-shoulder dime to Ford-Wheaton for the TD
videos.description: JT Daniels lobs one to Bryce Ford-Wheaton for the 16-yard touchdown, tying the score for West Virginia in the fourth.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Daniels drops back-shoulder dime to Ford-Wheaton for the TD) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: JT Daniels disappears in pile on short TD run
videos.description: JT Daniels gives West Virginia the lead late as he uses the QB sneak for the touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (JT Daniels disappears in pile on short TD run) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: West Virginia's McCormick ejected for targeting
videos.description: West Virginia's Wesley McCormick lays a huge hit on Rodney Hammond Jr., and he is ultimately ejected for targeting.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (West Virginia's McCormick ejected for targeting) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Abanikanda breaks multiple tackles and scores TD
videos.description: Pittsburgh ties the game as Israel Abanikanda breaks multiple tackles and scores the 24-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Abanikanda breaks multiple tackles and scores TD) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Miraculous pick-6 by M.J. Devonshire gives Pitt late lead
videos.description: After West Virginia wide receiver drops a pass, it falls into the hands of M.J. Devonshire who returns it 56 yards for the pick-6.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Miraculous pick-6 by M.J. Devonshire gives Pitt late lead) 2022/09/01

videos.headline: Pitt survives after WVU's nearly incredible grab ruled incomplete
videos.description: Reese Smith's catch is ruled incomplete for West Virginia in the final minute, as Pittsburgh prevails.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Pitt survives after WVU's nearly incredible grab ruled incomplete) 2022/09/01
